documents.title: Plate Tectonics
documents.content:
The theory that Earth's lithosphere is divided into plates that move over the asthenosphere.
Key Processes: Seafloor Spreading, Subduction, Continental Collision, Rifting

documents.title: Hydrological Cycle
documents.content:
The continuous movement of water on, above, and below the surface of the Earth.
Key Processes: Evaporation, Condensation, Precipitation, Runoff, Infiltration

documents.title: Core-Periphery Model
documents.content:
A model describing how economic, political, and cultural power is dispersed between core (dominant) and periphery (dependent) regions.
Key Processes: Uneven Development, Colonialism, Globalization

documents.title: Demographic Transition Model
documents.content: A model that describes population change over time, based on birth and death rates.

documents.title: Himalayas
documents.content:
Key Facts: highestPeak: Mount Everest (8,848m); length: 2,400 km; significance: Contains the world's highest peaks; influences climate (blocks monsoon winds).
Location: Asia
Countries: CN, IN, NP, BT

documents.title: Amazon Basin
documents.content:
Key Facts: area: ~7,000,000 sq km; river: Amazon River (RF-001); biome: Tropical Rainforest (BM-001)
Location: South America
Countries: BR, PE, CO, BO

documents.title: Lake Baikal
documents.content:
Key Facts: volume: Largest freshwater lake by volume (23,600 cubic km); depth: Deepest lake in the world (1,642m); age: Oldest lake in the world (25-30 million years); biodiversity: >2,000 endemic species
Location: Siberia, Russia

documents.title: Tropical Rainforest
documents.content: Characteristics: High temperature, high rainfall year-round, immense biodiversity.

documents.title: South Asian Monsoon
documents.content:
A seasonal weather pattern characterized by winds from the southwest (summer) bringing heavy rain, and winds from the northeast (winter) bringing dry conditions.
Mechanism: Differential heating of land and sea, shift of the ITCZ.
Impact: Critical for agriculture in India, Bangladesh, Pakistan; can cause severe flooding.

documents.title: Quaternary Sector
documents.content: Knowledge-based activities such as information technology, research and development, and consulting.
